item.title: 中国彩妆大亨在香港上市，跻身亿万富翁行列
item.description: 毛戈平是中国最著名的化妆师之一，他的美容公司在香港上市，结束了其辉煌的发展历程，这位前歌剧演员的高档粉饼和乳液打破了中国消费放缓的局面。【原文：One of China’s best known makeup artists, Mao Geping, took his beauty company public in Hong Kong, capping a remarkable run that’s seen the former opera performer’s premium powders and lotions defy the nation’s consumer slowdown.】

item.title: C3.ai 因销售强劲而大涨，并上调全年收入展望
item.description: 数据分析软件公司 C3.ai Inc. 公布季度营收超过预期，并上调了全年销售预期，在盘后交易中上涨约 13%。【原文：C3.ai Inc., a data-analysis software company, gained about 13% in extended trading after reporting quarterly revenue that topped estimates and raising its full-year sales forecast.】

item.title: 保尔森支持的 Perpetua 公司达成锑协议以削弱中国禁令的影响

item.title: 甲骨文增长乏力，云计算部门热情受挫
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）公布的季度营收符合预期，令投资者大失所望。该股在延时交易中下跌了约 8%。【原文：Oracle Corp. reported quarterly revenue in line with estimates, disappointing investors who have boosted the stock by 81% this year on enthusiasm for Oracle’s ascendant cloud business. The shares fell about 8% in extended trading.】

item.title: ICE 限制基因编辑糖在美国流通的举措可能会损害巴西糖业的发展
item.description: 洲际交易所限制转基因蔗糖交割的新规定可能会限制巴西蔗糖向美国的供应。【原文：A new Intercontinental Exchange rule restricting the delivery of genetically modified cane sugar could restrict the flow of Brazilian supplies to the US.】

item.title: 波多黎各调解员警告称公用事业债务问题的解决 "遥遥无期
item.description: 一个调解小组警告美国地区法官劳拉-泰勒-斯温（Laura Taylor Swain），如何以最佳方式减少波多黎各电力公司的债务，目前仍没有明确的途径。【原文：There remains no clear path on how to best reduce the debt of Puerto Rico’s power utility, a mediation team warned US District Judge Laura Taylor Swain, who is overseeing the seven-year bankruptcy.】

item.title: 亿万富翁鲁特菲的火爆上市事关接班人问题
item.description: 快时尚连锁店 Groupe Dynamite Inc. 背后的零售企业家表示，他在与私募股权投资集团洽谈后发现他们并不合适，因此决定将公司上市。【原文：The retail entrepreneur behind fast-fashion chain Groupe Dynamite Inc. says he decided to take the company public after exploring talks with private equity groups and determining they weren’t the right fit.】

item.title: Garda 指控竞争对手 Schonfeld 挖角明星投资组合经理
item.description: Garda Capital Partners 起诉 Schonfeld Strategic Advisors，称其竞争对手对冲基金违反竞业禁止协议，阴谋招募一名顶级固定收益投资组合经理。【原文：Garda Capital Partners sued Schonfeld Strategic Advisors, alleging its rival hedge fund schemed to recruit a top fixed-income portfolio manager in violation of his non-competition agreement.】

item.title: 根据国防法案，华为供应商将面临美国的进一步限制
item.description: 根据国防立法，美国立法者正着手禁止五角大楼与向华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：US lawmakers are moving to prohibit the Pentagon from doing business with companies that sell computer chips and services to Huawei Technologies Co. under defense legislation that could put further pressure on suppliers to the Chinese tech champion.】

item.title: 特鲁多表示，如果特朗普征收 25% 的关税，加拿大 "将做出回应
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）表示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对加拿大进口商品征收新的关税，加拿大 "将做出回应"，并认为特朗普在2018年对加拿大钢铁和铝征收关税时，报复性关税是成功的。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said Canada “will respond” if US President-elect Donald Trump imposes new tariffs on Canadian imports, and argued that retaliatory tariffs were successful when Trump put tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum in 2018.】

item.title: 得益于数字技术的发展，2024 年全球广告销售额将突破 1 万亿美元
item.description: 广告买家 GroupM 的最新报告显示，今年全球广告收入预计将增长 9.5%，达到 1.04 万亿美元，首次突破这一里程碑。【原文：Global advertising revenue is projected to climb 9.5% to $1.04 trillion this year, topping that milestone for the first time, according to a new report from ad buyer GroupM.】

item.title: 云计算税威胁芝加哥的硅谷雄心
item.description: 芝加哥争当中西部硅谷的努力近年来取得了一些重大胜利：谷歌在市中心购买了一栋巨大的建筑，PsiQuantum 公司宣布在该市投资 10 亿美元，当地初创企业在 2022 年创下了 190 亿美元的融资纪录。【原文：Chicago’s bid to become the Silicon Valley of the Midwest has registered some major wins in recent years: Google bought a huge downtown building, PsiQuantum Corp. announced a $1 billion investment in the city, and local startups raised a record $19 billion in 2022.】

item.title: T-Mobile 首席执行官称对第四季度业绩 "保持谨慎
item.description: T-Mobile US Inc.首席执行官迈克-希沃特（Mike Sievert）警告投资者对这家电信公司的第四季度业绩要 "谨慎"，因为它将 "后发制人"。【原文：T-Mobile US Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mike Sievert warned investors to “be cautious” about the telecom company’s fourth-quarter results, which will be “back-end loaded.”】

item.title: 纽蒙特在重大企业重组中裁减管理层职位
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.）解雇了近十名管理人员，其中包括一名高管团队成员，作为公司全面改革的一部分。【原文：Newmont Corp. let go of nearly a dozen managers, including a member of its executive team, as part of a sweeping corporate overhaul, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利大亨卡尔塔吉隆增持资产管理公司 Anima 股份
item.description: 意大利建筑业大亨弗朗切斯科-加埃塔诺-卡尔塔吉罗内（Francesco Gaetano Caltagirone）增持了阿尼玛控股公司（Anima Holding）的股份，从而在席卷全国金融服务业的交易浪潮中发挥更大的影响力。【原文：Italian construction tycoon Francesco Gaetano Caltagirone increased his stake in Anima Holding, positioning him for more influence in the wave of dealmaking that’s washing over the country’s financial services industry.】

item.title: 新泽西公交公司首席执行官在管理该公司七年后辞职
item.description: 新泽西公交公司首席执行官兼总裁凯文-科贝特（Kevin Corbett）将于下月卸任，在此之前，他执掌这家全美最大的公共交通服务提供商之一已近七年。【原文：New Jersey Transit Chief Executive Officer and President Kevin Corbett will step down from his position next month after nearly seven years at the helm of one of the largest public transit providers in the nation.】

item.title: OpenAI 将发布期待已久的索拉视频生成服务
item.description: OpenAI 正在推出一款名为 Sora 的人工智能系统，它可以根据文字提示生成逼真的视频，这距离这家初创公司首次公开预览该技术已经过去了近 10 个月。【原文：OpenAI is rolling out an artificial intelligence system called Sora that can generate realistic-looking videos from text prompts, nearly 10 months after the startup first publicly previewed the technology.】

item.title: 加纳前总统受命解决通货膨胀问题
item.description: 加纳投票选举前总统约翰-马哈马重返他八年前担任的职位，赋予了他解决这个西非国家沉重的债务负担和高昂的生活费用的强大使命。【原文：Ghana voted ex-President John Mahama to return to the role he served eight years ago, handing him a strong mandate to fix the West African nation’s crippling debt burden and high cost of living.】

item.title: 南非通往莫桑比克的重要贸易路线因抗议活动而关闭
item.description: 由于非洲东南部国家爆发了与选举有关的抗议活动，南非暂停了与莫桑比克这个重要的煤炭和铬出口中心的主要边境口岸的业务。【原文：South Africa suspended operations at its main border crossing with Mozambique, a key coal and chrome export hub, as election-related protests flared in the southeast African nation.】

item.title: 阿根廷石油产量有望将哥伦比亚挤出南美前三强
item.description: 阿根廷掀起的页岩钻探热潮使该国即将超越地区竞争对手哥伦比亚，成为南美洲排名前三的原油生产国。【原文：A shale-drilling frenzy in Argentina has put the country on the verge of leapfrogging regional rival Colombia as a top-three crude producer in South America.】

item.title: 最高法院的裁决为卢拉的财政计划设置了新障碍
item.description: 巴西最高法院的一名法官拒绝了重新考虑一项裁决的请求，该裁决使司法部门、政府和国会之间的关系变得复杂，可能会影响总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦为其财政紧缩计划赢得批准所做的努力。【原文：A Brazilian Supreme Court justice rejected a request to reconsider a ruling that has complicated relations between the judiciary, government and Congress, potentially denting President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s efforts to win approval for his fiscal austerity plan.】

item.title: 杠杆式中国 ETF 看涨押注净赚 1.38 亿美元纸面收益
item.description: 过去一周，交易员们在追踪中国指数的小型杠杆式交易所交易基金中囤积了价值数百万美元的看涨期权，由于北京最高领导人发出明年加强经济支持的信号后股价飙升，他们的纸面收益超过了 1.3 亿美元。【原文：Traders who scooped up millions of shares worth of bullish options over the past week in tiny, levered exchange-traded funds tracking Chinese indexes are up more than $130 million on paper as shares surged after top leaders in Beijing signaled stronger economic support next year.】

item.title: 纽约州霍楚尔提议向数百万居民发送 300 美元支票
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）希望向 860 万纽约人返还约 30 亿美元，以减轻工薪家庭的通胀成本。【原文：New York Governor Kathy Hochul wants to send about $3 billion back to 8.6 million New Yorkers in a bid to alleviate inflation costs for working families.】

item.title: 赞比亚纠正错误支付给中国的 8000 万美元债务
item.description: 赞比亚财政部的一位官员表示，赞比亚正在寻求补救其电力公司向中国支付的一笔错误款项，而中国仍在与赞比亚敲定一项旷日持久的债务重组协议。【原文：Zambia is seeking to remedy an erroneous payment made by its power utility to China while it is still finalizing a prolonged debt restructuring deal with the nation, a Treasury official said.】
